title: MoviePass subscribers in the U.S. 2019
summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of subscribers in thousands in the y axis.
Month June 2018 has the highest Number of subscribers in thousands and December 2016 has the lowest Number of subscribers in thousands.
The difference of Number of subscribers in thousands between the highest and lowest Month is 2980.0.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of subscribers in thousands in the y axis.
The Number of subscribers in thousands is highest at Month June 2018 and lowest at Month December 2016.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of subscribers in thousands in the y axis.
Month June 2018 has the highest Number of subscribers in thousands and December 2016 has the lowest Number of subscribers in thousands.
The difference of Number of subscribers in thousands between the highest and lowest Month is 2980.0.
max_summary: This is a bar chart representing Month in the x axis and Number of subscribers in thousands in the y axis.
The Number of subscribers in thousands is appeared to be the highest at Month June 2018 and lowest at Month December 2016.
Second maximum Number of subscribers in thousands is found at Month March 2018.
The maximum Month June 2018 has got 150.0 times higher Number of subscribers in thousands than the minimum Month December 2016.
Month June 2018 is higher than any other Months with value 3000.0, followed by March 2018, and January 2018. Down to Month December 2016 with the lowest value 20.0.
Over the past 7 Months, the Number of subscribers in thousands has reduced.
The average Number of subscribers in thousands in all 7 Months is 1056.43.
The Number of subscribers in thousands is 7395.0 if we add up values of all Months.
